intro: Dehaasia polyneura, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It is characterized by its rosette-shaped leaves and showy, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value. It prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil to thrive. Dehaasia polyneura is known for its ability to produce multiple blooms throughout the growing season.
